shorts.title: McDade splashpad reopened after temporary closure
shorts.title_distilled: McDade splashpad reopened after temporary closure.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU)— A fun way to cool off for kids is back open at McDade Park. The McDade splashpad has been reopened after being closed for almost a week due to a water pump issue. The McDade pool is still closed due to multiple leaks. Authorities say parts of the tiles have chips [...]
